document_data.name: Gur
document_data.mainbody: '''Gur''' was the language spoken by the [[Gur]] people of the [[Hordelands]].<ref name=D:SiT-p29/>
document_data.Description: Gur was a nasal language, with long E and I vowels drawn out.
document_data.History: Gur was considered one of the [[Eastern Imaskari languages]],<ref name=D:SiT-p29/> and was strongly influenced by the [[Shou Chiang languages]] of [[Kara-Tur]].
